EnhanceR Symposium 2024

Research IT contribution to FAIRness

  • Timetable

  • EnhanceR Seminar

Registration

The registration for the event is open until Oct 24th, 2024.

Participation is free of charge, but the number of places is limited. Registrations will be treated on a first come, first served basis.

Registration form

If you have any questions, contact the organizers at office@enhancer.ch
